title: Unchained Alistar
body: I try to get Unchained Alistar {{champion:12}}  by subbing to riot on youtube but cant get it anyone know why?

replies.body: it's kinda a bug right now submit a ticket and they will give you one you can also get a skin thought twitter and facebook
As LaoBushido mentioned, if you go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) we can add it to your account. :]
Because Youtube doesn't work (oh so very, _very_ surprising) and Google doesn't care.
The same thing happened to me. I had to comment on any random video to show activity on my account and then it worked
I bought Unchained Alistar with RP when I first started... didn't know it was free by subscribing until recently.. Riot refunded me some IP.. Nice to know my money is wasted.
